title: Fortify eSports - Looking for Jungle
body:
Hey guys, Foritfy eSports are currently looking for a strong main Jungle.
Fortify eSports are a proud gaming organisation with access to a ts server, coaching, analytics and management.
REQUIREMENTS-
1. Diamond 3 or higher Solo queue rank. 
2. Great communication skills.
3. Positive attitude and willingness to learn.
4. Available most nights throughout the week from 6pm-10pm but also having time to work on your solo queue.
5. Must be able to play in various tournaments such as OOL and Summoners society etc.
6. Be up to date with current meta.
If you are interested and would like a chance to trial you can message me on league Draxxon.
cheers guys.
